name: Raiding Tool: Hookshot
text: When this card is equipped to a "Tomb Raider" monster: Draw 1 card. You can destroy this card; Return 1 "Tomb Raider" monster from your field to your hand, then, Special Summon 1 "Tomb Raider" monster from your Deck. You can only use this effect of "Raiding Tool: Hookshot" once per turn.
